channel.title: Paypal info?
channel.description: Well i was going to make a paypal account that i could have money transferred onto for rs gold that i sold online and then use the moeny to buy scripts. But i was wondering how that worked or if anyone could explain it to me.

item.title: Paypal info?
item.dc:creator: @davidude36 Brolapse
item.description:
@davidude36 wrote:

i think you have to be verified for some trasnfers (e.g. i think maybe direct from a credit card to ure account) but for some transfers you canjust set up an account and boom its done.

btw someone send me money to dave.rocks@hotmail.com

also jme_009 thanks this OJ vodka is nyce

Read full topic

item.title: Paypal info?
item.dc:creator: @jme jme
item.description:
@jme wrote:

You just sign up for paypal and you can either add a credit card to your account, or you can add your bank account.

I just entered my bank info and then I was ready to go

Read full topic
